column5: I have a fishing trip to rainy planned for the first week of feb. We plan on fishing a few day's on the canadian north arm for walleye and pike,then a couple days out of international falls for crappie.We were hoping someone could give a few pointers on where to find the walleye or northerns,what kind of structure they are using,and some tips on presentations. Any input would be greatly appreciated.Thanks
Where abouts in the north arm are you fishing, and where are you staying.
